enam bauddha hindu muslim ki්rasthiyani yana sama aagamakatama jathiyakatama ayath aya ekata ekamuthu wi pawathwana uthsawaya nisayi.bauddha bathimathun ‘sadu sadu’ hadin thama aagamika wathawath pawathwana wita hindu bathimathun ‘haro haro’ kiyamin thama aagamika wathawath pawathwathi.bauddha hindu bathimathun ekama puda pujawanta sahabhagi wima pamanak ma nowa ekama sthanaye ekata hindagena kama bima huwamaru karagena pawulaka sahodara sahodariyan lesin katayuthu kirima mema pudabime balawegaya lesa salakiya haki ya.dutugamunu rajathuma sha්ri lankawa eksesath karaganima sandaha yuddhayata yamata pera katharagama manik gange ‘jiwamali’ thotedi (diyakapana sthanaya) sha්ri skandakumara dewiyan hamu wi thaman yuddhayen jayaga්rahanaya kalahoth dewiyan wenuwen dewalayak idikara dena bawata wu poronduwa (baraya) itu kirimaki.
eeth eeka mata udaw una hinsana nadu wala paminilikarayan una dennekge chayarupa hoya ganna.
oyawa mata kalin hambunanam?
sathiyakata eka kotasak kiyana adahasata mamath kamathiyi.

marthu 23 da perawaruwe jathika pusthakala ha pralekhana sewa mandalayedi madhya hamuwak pawathwamin eksath janatha nidahas sandhanaye hawulkara paksha kihipayak wipaksha nayaka thanathurata mahajana eksath peramune nayaka dinesh gunawardhana mahatha path kala yuthu yayi yojana karuni.eeta hethuwa nimal siripala wipaksha nayakamakama darana shri lanka nidahas pakshaye jyeshta upa sabhapathiwaru, upa sabhathiwaru upa lekamwaru athuluwa danata 26 denek aanduwe amathi thanathuru bharagena thibena pasubimaka saba wipakshaya kumakda yanna nowisadunu ubhathokotikayayi.me pilibanda parlimenthuwe da wada wiwada athiwu athara kathanayakathumada pawasuwe eya thamantath sitha gatha nohaki prashnayak bawayi.
